mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from board_report where b_num=#{b_num}
select * from board_report where m_num=#{m_num} and b_num=#{b_num}

select * from (select aa.b_num,m.id,b.b_title,aa.b_report,m1.id bj_id,b.category_num,c.category_name,rownum rnum from (select b_num,count(b_num) b_report from board_report group by b_num order by b_report desc)aa, board b,category c,member m, member m1 where aa.b_num=b.b_num and b_delete=0 and m.m_num=b.m_num and m1.m_num=b.bj_num and b.category_num=c.category_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(a.b_num),0) cnt from (select b_num,count(b_num) b_report from board_report group by b_num)a,board b where a.b_num=b.b_num and b.b_delete=0
